name: 灵梦的激急击鸡祭 Reimu's Fighting Chicken Festival
name_original: 灵梦的激急击鸡祭 Reimu's Fighting Chicken Festival
description:
The game process is not long, about one or two hours.

background introduction：

Suddenly, many huge chicks appeared in Lotus Land! What exactly happened again?

Miko in Hakurei Jinja,Hakurei Reimu Ordinary Mage Kirisame Marisa

They set out together to solve new problems


Game content：

This game is a light action side scrolling RPG.

Obtain props along the way, deal with enemies in various ways, and embark on adventures in various scenes through different terrains.


Game features：

  • You can switch between two characters at any time to attack from far or near

  • People who have never heard of 东方project can also enjoy playing

  • Magic props that can help combat

  • Defeat the enemy through certain strategies

  • Mild puzzle solving

  • Original or adapted music

  • A relaxed and enjoyable gaming atmosphere

  • Make with RPGmaker
